Description.Text: Bekdas Hotel Deluxe is a stylish 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Istanbul. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, a rooftop restaurant and a great location close to the magnificent Laleli Mosque. The area surrounding Beyazit Square and the Grand Bazaar is densely populated and contains a huge amount of historic buildings dating from throughout the city's eventful past. Nearby places of interest include early 16th-century Bayezid II Mosque, ruins of the Roman Forum of Theodosius, 19th-century Beyazit Tower, 4th-century Valens Aqueduct and the old sea walls along the Sea of Marmara. Aksaray tram stop is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Istanbul destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building featuring an elegant facade with wrought iron faux balconies. Facilities include a gym and sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in an elegant style with dark wood furniture and artwork above the bed. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, safe and an en-suite bathroom. The rooftop restaurant offers local cuisine in a stylish setting with views of the city. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
